problem_text_cn: 如图,直线a、b、c分别与直线m、n交于点A、B、C、D、E、F．已知直线a∥b∥c,若AB=2,BC=3,则\frac{DE}{EF}的值为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, straight lines a, b, and c intersect straight lines and n at points A, B, C, D, E, and F respectively. Given the straight line a ∥ b ∥ c, if AB = N_0, BC = N_1, then the value of \frac DEEF is ()
raw_comment: 本题考查的是平行线分线段成比例定理,掌握定理的内容、找准对应关系是解题的关键．
